name: HoloMan: a Mega Man style hololive fan game (Windows,Android,WebGL))
name_original: HoloMan: a Mega Man style hololive fan game (Windows,Android,WebGL))
description:
Introduction:

This is a MegaMan style platformer game with hololive characters and meme.

WebGL:

https://yaoyuanchang.github.io/HoloMan/

Features:

co-op (local multiple player)

MegaMan liked-physics

Support keyboard,gamepad and touch screen

Controls:

Player1:(blue area)

W,S,A,D  → up, down, left, right

F → buster shoot(attack)

G → jump and double jump

H → dash

R → enable/disable 8-ways shooting

Player2:(red area)

up,down,left,right  → up, down, left, right

numpad 1 → buster shoot(attack)

numpad 2 → jump and double jump

numpad 3 → dash

numpad 4 → enable/disable 8-ways shooting

Player3:(green area)

I,K,J,L  → up, down, left, right

; → buster shoot(attack)

' → jump and double jump

] → dash

P → enable/disable 8-ways shooting

Player4:(yellow area)

home,end,del,pagedown  → up, down, left, right

numpad 7 → buster shoot(attack)

numpad 8 → jump and double jump

numpad 9 → dash

numpad * → enable/disable 8-ways shooting

Control and cheat keys (gray area)

1 → enable/disable speed to 0.1

2 → kill all player

3 → heal all player

4 → resurrect dead player

5 → enable/disable virtual controller

6 → rebinding input devices

7 → player 1 exit/enter in stage

8 → player 2 exit/enter in stage

9 → player 3 exit/enter in stage

0 → player 4 exit/enter in stage

- → decrease try count

+ → increase try count

numpad - → decrease max health

numpad + → inrease max health

Credits:

Models:

Mori Calliope、Takanashi Kiara、Ninomae Ina'nis、Gawr Gura、Watson Amelia from lexferreira89

Minato Aqua, Usada Pekora, Kiryu Coco from warop

Akai Haato from wpotion

Texture:

Mega Man series from https://www.spriters-resource.com/ 

Hololive series from hololive member's channel 

others from https://creazilla.com/, https://www.pngwing.com/, https://www.kenney.nl/, https://opengameart.org/ and https://twitter.com/Tiamant_Torriet/status/1371361522224660482?s=20

BGM & SFX: 

Rockman X1~6 Collection (SNES, PS1, Saturn, Windows) (2003) MP3 - Download Rockman X1~6 Collection (SNES, PS1, Saturn, Windows) (2003) Soundtracks for FREE! (khinsider.com)

PlayStation - Mega Man X5 - Sound Effects - The Sounds Resource (sounds-resource.com)

Project X Zone 2: Brave New World, Synthescissor, TShadowKnight hololive member's channel.

Code reference:

akashenen/2d-platformer-controller: Simple implementation of a 2D platformer character controller using raycasts for smooth and precise input and movement (github.com)

HDNua/RxpbEngineUnity: "Rockman X: Pandora's Box" Engine using Unity3D (github.com)
